1.content:
first of all who do you want to gain?

Polly Esther, the female member of the Pizza cat team?

Francine, the owner of the restaurant the Pizza cats work at?

Lucille, the object of both Speedy's and Guido's affections?

Princess Vi,the spoiled, selfish princess of Little Tokyo?

or Carla, Bad Bird's childhood sweetheart?
1.title: Let's begin

choices: it's part of Big Cheese's plan to beat the Pizza cats
FA: she meets someone who would like her with more weight
over eating (she does work in a pizza parlour after all)
11.content: Why and how will she gain?
11.title: Polly Esther

choices: polly keeps eating as she has been in till the weight gain becomes undeniable
113.content:
"hey Polly." Francine asked as to based around on the slow day in the parlor.
"Yeah Francine?" Polly replied
"have you put on weight?"
"what?!" Polly shouted
"just asking" Francine replied nervously.

me gaining weight of of all the nerve I mean maybe I have been eating a bit more but I haven't gotten fat or anything.

12.content: how will she get fat?
12.title: Francine

125.content: she enters and eating contest for the cash prize.
125.title: something else

choices: Francine notices someone she knew at the contest.
1251.content: Francine sat down at a long table alongside several other people for an eating contest. Normally something like this wouldn't have interested her but this contest had a large cash prize and she couldn't resist.
1251.title: eating contest

info.brief_description: The girls from the old comical anime start to put on the pounds as they gain and grow.
info.description:
Well seeing as there doesn't seem to be anything involing the PIzza cats, I thought I'd add this.

for thoses who don't know what The Samurai Pizza Cats are go through this link to learn about them http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samurai_Pizza_Cats

So pick which female character you gain to gain and get her piling the pounds, the skys the limit

and now for some rules
no vore, no sex and gay/lesbion
plase keep the story consistent (no starting a new story during a exsiting one)
try to making the chapters longer then just two short senticenes, try at lest for one decent length paragraph, and the well written
no slob stuff, keep it clean
no killing or serouis harming of anyof the characters
no male weight gain

any bracking of the rules will result in removel of the offending chapter

So let's begin, and let's add some humor, this is a comical show after all
info.pretty_title: Samurai Pizza Cats female weight gain
